page.title: 07SURVEY / CATEGORIES USED.
page.content: 1. LOCAL GOVERNMENT: included anyone whose income came from the County Council and included teachers. 2. NATIONAL GOVERNMENT: included anyone whose income was paid on a National basis. The Forces, Post Office & British Rail included here. 3. COMMERCE: catered for anyone not involved in industry or agriculture. This category included retail trade, service industries(catering,driving instructors, solicitors) & banking. 4. NATIONALHEALTH SERVICE. 5. INDUSTRIAL. 6. AGRICULTURE. ................................. INTERVIEWS:The interviewees were chosen entirely at random either in the street or at home(proportions in the two villages were as their areas) Types of property did not play any part in selection,but should have done
